result.title: The Act of Sharing.
result.content:
Hi Friends,

Happy New Year

I wanted to share an idea with you all. Since ,there are many problems on codeforces and we cannot solve all of them ,why don't we share good problem which we encounter .Through this we can get all good problems at one place.

I know , there will be different difficulty level for different coders but it will help everyone to improve.

In case one feels that a particular problem requires knowledge of a algo which is not common then he/she can mention it among with the question .

For example my suggestion - Problem -> Problem no.1

Requirement ->MST

I hope you will also contribute in the comments. Not only codeforces but problems from other sites will be also appreciated.

Thank you.
